alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued December 15 at 3:02PM MST until December 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Stagnant conditions will have potential to trap pollutants near the ground with deteriorated air quality. * WHERE...Bonners Ferry, Coeur d`Alene, Post Falls, Eastport, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Athol, Priest River, Hayden, Clark Fork, Sandpoint, and Worley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface.
info.instruction: Buildup of fine pollution particles can be harmful to those sensitive to air pollution including people with lung and heart problems, people with diabetes, children and the elderly.
